name: Cold Waters

files.setup: N/A:Select the installer for the game

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the installer for the game
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Cold Waters/ColdWaters.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating win64 prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: arial
    arch: win64
    description: Installing corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Installing the game.
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
